Header: More tourists at Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage
Content: Assistant Director of the Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage Mihiran Medawala says that the number of local and foreign tourists visiting the orphanage is increasing daily. The government has taken steps immediately to strengthen the security of the country following the Easter Sunday bomb attacks. Therefore the arrival of tourists has become normal. Assistant Director Mihiran Medawala said that the number of tourists visiting the Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage has increased.
